First off, the info in the torrent is wrong. It shows a running time of 95 minutes (1 hour 35 minutes); however, the file is actually 118 minutes (1 hour 58 minutes). Missing five minutes could be credits (opening credits seem truncated) or closing credits. The audio/video is on point with the majority of DVDRips out there.
